descriptionNullable:
📚 Title: Bangla Lemmatization Dataset

📝 Description:
The "Lemmatization Dataset" is a treasure trove of lemmatized words 📖 sourced from a diverse range of texts, with a prominent focus on Rabindranath Tagore's short stories and news articles spanning various domains. This dataset serves as a crucial asset for natural language processing tasks, particularly those targeting the Bengali language. 🇧🇩

📦 Content:
This dataset is distributed as a single CSV file, "lemmatization.csv," featuring two essential columns:

- "WORD": Represents individual words from the source texts.
- "LEMMA": Corresponds to the respective lemma forms of the words, aiding in linguistic analysis and understanding. 🧠
📜 Licensing:
The original dataset does not explicitly specify a particular license. Users are encouraged to exercise due diligence and observe copyright and usage guidelines when incorporating this dataset into their research, projects, or applications. 🚧

📚 Citation:

- Firoj Alam, Md Arid Hasan, Tanvir Alam, Akib Khan, Janntatul Tajrin, Naira Khan, Shammur Absar Chowdhury. (2021). "A Review of Bangla Natural Language Processing Tasks and the Utility of Transformer Models." 📑 arXiv preprint arXiv:2107.03844 (2021).
- Abhisek Chakrabarty, Onkar Arun Pandit, Utpal Garain. (2017). "Context Sensitive Lemmatization Using Two Successive Bidirectional Gated Recurrent Networks." 📜 Proceedings of the 55th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics, Vancouver, Canada (2017). 📄 DOI: 10.18653/v1/P17-1136
title: Bangla Lemmatization Dataset
subtitle: Bangla Word To Lemma
